author: rovere
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is mainly fixing long-standing issues related to `LayerClusters` and `Tracksters` validation. A quick summary of the improvements in this regard:

   * Fix the score definition that was wrong in both cases. In particular, changes to the overall normalization were needed.
   * Fix the computation of the fraction of the shared energy between a `Trackster` and its linked `CaloParticles`
   * Review the definitions of _merge_, _duplicate_ and _fake_ rate for the `Trackster` validation. Once this PR will be merged, the accompanying documentation at [this link](https://hgcal.web.cern.ch) will be updated.
   * Add the possibility to run the validation on several `Tracksters` collections in a more or less transparent way. **More changes are foreseen for the future** (in separate PRs), namely:
      * separate the _association code_ from the _validation code_, creating ad-hoc `EDProducers` for that purpose;
      * improve the overall `python` definition of parameters and the accompanying `C++` code;
      * improve the python plotting capabilities.
   * The improved `Trackster` validation, when tested on closeby samples, allowed for better tuning of the cuts of the electromagnetic `TICL` iteration.

We expect differences in `Tracksters`' output for the electromagnetic iteration and, also, changes in few histograms (binning and naming)

#### PR validation:

Tested with:
   * `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos`
   * `runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 20493.51,20493.52`
title: Improve Score Definition and EM Trackster Reconstruction
